Articles.Content:
Hi, sorry if this has been answered elsewhere (feel free to lock and point me in the right direction if you would be so kind).

I'd very much like to know of every mass-less part currently in the game. My ultimate goal is to make as mass-less a ship as possible capable of extraordinary feats.

Parts I know of:

1. Octagonal Strut

2. EAS-4 Strut Connector

3. OX-SAT Photovoltaic Panel

4. Z-100 Rechargeable Battery Pack

I'm not sure what determines which part is mass-less (Otherwise I wouldn't be asking). XD

I'll add people's input on the matter in this post.

Thanks very much and happy gaming.
The reason some parts are mass less is because in their respective part file there is an option called 'physicsSignifcance' all mass less parts have it set to 0.

The reason some parts are mass less is because in their respective part file there is an option called 'physicsSignifcance' all mass less parts have it set to 0.

Is it safe to say that any part could be made mass-less with that added code?

Setting PhysicsSignificance = 1 should make any part massless. There is a list of massless parts in the wiki.

The physicslessness of the big 3.75 m decoupler causes many bugs. Until there is a fix, everyone should edit the part.cfg for if and set PhysicsSignificance = 0.

Ah, thank you very much.
